entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [wasm][debugger] Assertion in `DebuggerTests.EvaluateOnCallFrameTests.EvaluateSimpleMethodCallsError` #65744
  • [wasm][debugger] Assertion caused by invalid array id being used #65742
  • Corefx internal PRs should use non '.Open' queues #65741
  • [API Proposal]: Guid.NewNonCryptographicGuid #65736
  • Eliminate for loop in `UnicastIPAddressInformation`.`PrefixLengthToSubnetMask` #65732
  • System.PlatformNotSupportedException: at System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.set_SecureSocketLayer in docker container #65726
  • DebuggerDisplay for System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch #65724
    7.0.0
  • [Linux][Arm64] Runtime test runs doesn't seem to respect build properties #65713
    7.0.0
  • Test failure: System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.ImpersonatedAuthTests.DefaultHandler_ImpersonatedUser_Success #65712
    7.0.0
  • Configuration binder failed when getter of read only property throw exception #65710
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix OnFrameCall for methods on variable values #65707
  • [wasm] Random crash in wasm with emscripten 2.0.34 and higher #65705
    7.0.0
  • [Mono]: JIT/Methodical/eh/finallyexec/loopinfinally_do and JIT/Methodical/eh/finallyexec/loopinfinally_ro fails on Mono Windows. #65704
  • [Mono]: Tailcall p/invoke using struct value type together with jmp IL instruction fails on Mono Windows x64. #65702
  • [Mono]: DllImport using MarshalAs(UnmanagedType.VBByRefStr) and CharSet = CharSet.Unicode not supported on Mono. #65698
  • UseWindowsService then run in windows service will crash. #65696
  • [Mono]: Marshaling structs using explicit layout including strings not supported on Mono. #65695
  • Memory dump of AccessViolationException on gc_heap::mark_object_simple and heap corruption #65694
    6.0.x
  • Regressions in System.Security.Cryptography.Tests.Perf_Rfc2898DeriveBytes #65719
  • Regressions in System.Tests Perf_Random/Perf_String #65718
  • Regressions in System.Tests.Perf_String and others #65717
  • Regressions in BenchmarksGame.RegexRedux_1 #65716
  • Assertion failed 'alignInstr->idaIG->endsWithAlignInstr()' during 'Generate code' #65690
    7.0.0
  • Default to IsDevelopment in common development scenarios #65689
  • Assertion failed 'optLoopTable[i].lpContainedBy(top, bottom)' during 'Find loops' #65688
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\jit64\\opt\\rngchk\\ArrayWithThread_o\\ArrayWithThread_o.cmd #65687
  • Test failure JIT\\Methodical\\Boxing\\seh\\try_il_r\\try_il_r.cmd #65686
  • Test failure baseservices\\threading\\threadpool\\bindhandle\\bindhandle1\\bindhandle1.cmd #65685
  • Path.GetFullPath has different behavior on macOS and Linux when passed a string of whitespace #65683
    7.0.0

Closed

  • Mono assert hit when calling GetFunctionPointerForDelegate when delegate has Nullable<T> return type #63962
    7.0.0
  • Add back StructWithPublicDefaultConstructor test #58639
    7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix support for using `ActiveIssue`, and other related attributes #62660
  • QUIC port conflicts do not report an error #59382
    7.0.0
  • Reopen OpenSSL issue in #44191 #46271 #64886
  • StreamPipeWriter doesn't dispose the inner stream on complete if flush fails #64639
  • NetworkAddressChange.Unix can start reading from unrelated handles. #64319
    7.0.0
  • Enable SocketsHttpHandler.ConnectCallback to negotiate TLS #42455
    Future
  • Serialization of abstract properties #65662
  • Testing issue triage automation -- please disregard #62246
  • ExecutionContext flow for library code #62589
  • [wasm] Interpreter assertion in `JIT/Methodical/NaN/r4NaNconv_il_r/r4NaNconv_il_r.sh`- `src/mono/mono/mini/interp/transform.c:5917` #65681
  • [API Proposal]: C#/VB support in StringSyntaxAttribute. #65708
  • [wasm][debugger] Windows drive letter is both uppercase and lowercase in chrome debugger #53036
    Future
  • I'm not a C/C++ developer, #65691
  • huge vm usage in docker when program crash can't dump. #55254
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Make ObjectConverter use ConverterStrategy.Object #65748
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • [Perf][Maui] Set only android-arm64 to be built for Maui #65747
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • support WindowsPrincipal in HttpListenerWebSocketContext #65746
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Fix entrypoint name in TestUtilities #65745
    area-System.Security
  • [mono] Throw a MarshalDirectiveException when marshalling generic ins… #65743
    area-VM-meta-mono, mono-mirror, community-contribution
  • [mono][jit] Remove support for -O=-float32, i.e. treating r4 values a… #65740
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Fix unwanted session caching in mutual authentication tests #65739
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Reimplement stubs to improve performance #65738
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix inlining of IPAddress ctor #65735
    area-System.Net
  • Centralize regex tree analysis for atomic/capture/backtracking detection #65734
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Build a new version of System.Runtime.Experimental with the correct assembly version #65733
    Servicing-consider
  • Moving "Generic Math" in box and making it no longer experimental #65731
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Host test error format #65730
    area-Host
  • Improve performance of decrypt one shots #65725
    area-System.Security
  • [mono][jit] Transition the x86 backend to use SSE for fp arithmetic. #65723
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [docs] Create mono-thread-state-machine.md #65720
    documentation, area-Threading-mono
  • [wasm] emscripten 3.1.4 bump #65703
    * NO MERGE *, area-Build-mono
  • Draft for Min/Max intrinsics xarch (#65625) #65700
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • [mono] Remove an usage of g_utf8_strup (), its not needed. #65727
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Add back StructWithPublicDefaultConstructor test #65616
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Add support for using Conditional* attributes for tests #65684
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Added OnesComplement, Sqrt, Negate vector intrinsics #65438
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Always dispose inner stream in StreamPipeWriter.Complete* #65462
    area-System.IO.Pipelines
  • Disable no_tiered_compilation scenario for mono in run-test-job.yml #65701
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • NetworkAddressChange.Unix: use async Socket API to wait for events. #64614
    area-System.Net, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Fix slngen.proj and update solution files #65711
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Allow SslStream in ConnectCallback #63851
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Do not set `GLOB_REF` for invariant indirections #65709
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][interp] Fix conv.r.un from r4 #65697
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Fix scheduled search in issue cleanup automation #65699
    area-Meta
  • Roll out automated issue cleanup #65576
    area-Meta
  • Ensure all expected paths are logged on test failure #65666
    area-System.IO, test enhancement
  • More clean up for RegexOptions.NonBacktracking #65479
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions

Updated

  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-jit directory #62843
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • [tests][eventpipe] Port over Dotnet/Diagnostics to enable eventpipe tests on Android #64358
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Adding Regex.IsMatch(Span) and RegexRunner.Scan() methods #65473
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, new-api-needs-documentation
  • PoC TLS resume on Linux client #64369
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux, 7.0.0
  • Update GeneratedDllImportAttribute CharSet -> StringMarshalling #65544
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Add the CustomTypeMarshallerAttribute type to make it easier to identify marshaller types #65591
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Fix NTAuthentication.MakeSignature/VerifySignature on Linux #65679
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • Improve ImmutableArray.RemoveRange #65186
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • [API Implementation]: DirectoryInfo.CopyTo / Directory.Copy #62375
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Publish crossgen for pkg #65520
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Backport Fix PerformanceCounter's when running with Globalization Invariant Mode #65537
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter, 6.0.4
  • Remove the Unix code from `System.Drawing.Common`. #64623
    area-System.Drawing, community-contribution
  • Use ValueStringBuilder to fix allocations in ToString() methods of XdsDateTime and XsdDuration #64868
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Use C# 10's enhanced struct initialization features #63131
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • JIT: Faster vector == Vector128.Zero on arm64 #65632
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add missing GC.SuppressFinalize #64997
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • [MonoAPI] Split type and function headers, add MONO_API_FUNCTION macro #65446
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Fix DNS cancellation deadlock #63904
    area-System.Net, 7.0.0
  • Use SECPKG_ATTR_REMOTE_CERT_CHAIN to retrieve server cert during handshake #65134
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [draft][wasm] JSImport/JSExport prototype #64493
    NO REVIEW, arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Add "[createdump]" prefix to all createdump output and logging for VS4Mac #65444
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 6.0.4
  • Fix Queryable-to-Enumerable overload mapping logic #65569
    area-System.Linq, 7.0.0
  • [DRAFT][PERF][MAUI] Add startup time and size mesauresments for dotnet-podcast app #65398
  • [wasm][debugger] First draft of debug on firefox #61776
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Add HostApplicationBuilder #65109
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Hosting
  • [API Implementation]: SafeFileHandle overloads for SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Deduplicate some HWI codegen code #65302
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Checking CI build for segmenting diagnostics eventpipe tests for Android #65489
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Improved handling of Antimirov mode in Nonbacktracking Regex engine #65637
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [wasm][debugger] Add per-test ids, and save logs to files for the test, and proxy messages #63564
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Optimize the Regex source generator's handling of `Compilation` objects. #65431
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution
  • Send CA names on Linux and OSX #65195
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Fix for number of used frame infos during crossgen2 compilation #64549
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Enable QJFL and OSR by default for x64 and arm64 #65675
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Disable R2R code for all associated components of a composite image #65536
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 6.0.4
  • [wasm][debugger] Run debugger test in codespace #64746
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Repair inconsistent nullability nullability on TypeConverter (#63186) #63874
    area-System.ComponentModel, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [Mono] Enable generating SIMD intrinsics for System.Numerics.Vector on Arm64 #65486
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [release/6.0] Make sure WinHttpHandler 6.0.1 is released #65523
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] [mono][s390x] Fix OP_FCONV_TO_I and OP_RCONV_TO_I #65328
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 6.0.4
  • [release/6.0] [mono] Fix r8->i conversion on amd64. #65329
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 6.0.4
  • [release/6.0] Ensure that tls_destructionMonitor is initialized if a thread is attached to the runtime. #65406
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 6.0.4
  • [release/6.0] [mono] Fix stacktrace from DIM #65509
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 6.0.4
  • Add a transport package with libmono-profiler-aot.so on Android #65401
    area-Build-mono
  • add code to read active listeners on FreeBSD #64433
    area-System.Net, os-freebsd, os-mac-os-x, 7.0.0
  • [iOS] Enable some previously skipped tests #65652
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • JIT: Unroll Equals and StartsWith for constant strings and spans. [0..32] chars #65288
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Zip64ExtraField reads StartDiskNumber as uint32 #62959
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Improve incremental build times of the libraries subset #64000
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] stabilize QUIC tests on server 2022 #65097
    area-System.Net, test enhancement, 6.0.x
  • First try at implementing newly suggested ctor for providing tighter control over charset #63231
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Remove Unused Encoding on UriHelper #65330
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net, 6.0.4
  • [release/6.0] update expected exception for cases when all requested TLS versions are disabled #65046
    area-System.Net, test enhancement, 6.0.x
  • [wasm] Bump sdk for workload testing to `7.0.100-preview.2.22108.4` #65003
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [crossgen2] Promote single byref aot. #65682
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Expand indirection cell calls in IR instead of doing ad-hoc optimizations in codegen #65388
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [Mono] Add SIMD intrinsic for Vector64/128 comparisons #65128
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • crossgen2: Add --imagebase option #65567
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Remove OpenSSL error queue checking in SslInitializer #65501
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net, 6.0.x
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-vm directory #62885
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • WIP: CoreCLR runtime tests on Mono Windows x64. #64281
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Optional param fix 56251 #64970
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [mono] Decompress ICU data during iOS/tvOS app startup #64967
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios, os-tvos, os-maccatalyst
  • Ad-Hoc codesign on macOS-arm64 for crossgen2 binaries #65661
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr

entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] ilc assertion failed when compiling ImageSharp #1851

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Referencing a MultiTarget Framework Project(MTFP) in a MTFP causes incomplete deps.json file (net6) #24047

PullRequests

Updated

  • Annotate content items for web projects with a special attribute #23973
    Area-AspNetCore
  • [WorkloadInstall] Simplify code workload install command line #24028
  • Add zsh compdef completion script. #14239
  • fix dotnet run infinite loop by rendering help explicitly #23688
    Area-Tools
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1625554 #23858
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-22
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: "file private" visibility #5529
    Needs More Work
  • [Proposal]: Avoid synthesizing parameterless struct constructors #5552
  • Allow null conditional (?.) operator on left hand side of assignment #2883
    Backlog
  • Definite Assignment in Struct Constructors #5737
  • [Proposal]: Adding Index support to existing library types (redux) #5596
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: Collection literals #5354
    Working Set

PullRequests

Created

  • Replace spec content with links #5815

Merged

  • Pattern matching ReadOnlySpan<char>: add unresolved questions #5816

Updated

  • ModuleInitializerAttribute should not be emitted as a custom attribute #3783

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • LSIF tool has uncaught exception when Uri is relative path #59692
  • Proposal: IncrementalValuesProvider<TSource>.Any() extension #59690
  • Find Reference index construction should appear in Task Status Center #59688
  • Upgrading Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp package from 4.0.1 to 4.1.0 broke build until SDK 6.0.2 and VS update #59687
  • Symbol navigation from Stack Trace Explorer problems #59682

Closed

  • ValueTracker: avoid constructing symbols in-proc (on client) #59378
    17.2
  • [Proposal] Color for User Types - Structures within the Dark theme #1482
    Backlog
  • Code Cleanup execution doesn't honor .editorconfig rules #50504
    Backlog
  • IDE0046 code profiling not taken in account #43503
    Backlog
  • Code cleanup supports all code style rules #58086
    Backlog
  • A part of lambda improvements feature doesn't work with latest SDK 6.0.101 #58619
    17.1
  • Generic Methods can't implement non-generic methods #59686

PullRequests

Created

  • Add telemetry at async completion layer #59694
    Area-IDE
  • Add LSP spell checking support. #59693
    Area-IDE
  • Merge 'dotnet/main' into CheckedUserDefinedOperators #59691
    Area-Compilers, auto-merge, New Feature - CheckedUserDefinedOperators
  • Copy source file to a temp path instead of using it directly #59685
    Area-IDE
  • Simple attempt to find implementation assembly #59684
    Area-IDE, Feature Request
  • Add support for yield return to CompleteStatementCommandHandler #59683
    Area-IDE, Community

Merged

  • Fix race condition in RequestTelemetryLogger #59669
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Value Tracking: Remove inproc symbol usage #59473
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Enable CA2009: Do not call ToImmutableCollection on an ImmutableCollection value #53141
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • add all analyzers that are configured via editorconfig to code cleanup #59106
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add build step to generate SBOM #59663
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #59681
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Bind declarations of unary and binary checked operators #59644
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - CheckedUserDefinedOperators
  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #59695
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Use BatchFixer to fix all for naming violation #59452
    Area-IDE
  • Support declaring and binding to methods with `params Span<T>` #59123
    Area-Compilers
  • Diagnostic incremental analyzer #59456
    Area-IDE
  • Add external access APIs for O# #59469
    Area-IDE
  • Extend scope within nameof in attribute on method #40525
    Area-Compilers, PR For Personal Review Only, 17.1
  • Correctly apply anchor indentation adjustments in the presence of trivia #59654
    Area-IDE
  • Handle binary files in AdditionalTextComparer.GetHashCode #59660
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • Finalize New Inline Rename UI #59351
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Main attributes for simple programs #59471
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix more lock contention #59638
    Area-IDE
  • Do not retry on Clipboard API for StackTraceExplorer #59658
    Area-IDE
  • Improve PDB source document project handling #59643
    Area-IDE
  • Render exception documentation texts. #56162
    Area-IDE
  • Allow exception local to be used in filter prologue in async methods #59608
    Area-Compilers
  • Fixed odd naming suggestions #59674
    Area-IDE, Community
  • allow third party codfixers to be run in code cleanup #59631
    Area-IDE
  • Use the same codepath for computing light-bulb actions to determine if hte lightbulb shoudl appear at all. #59599
    Area-IDE
  • [LSP] Cache parsed xml snippets for razor #59605
    Area-IDE, LSP

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • TaskResultExecutor is never used by ActionMethodExecutor #40364
  • Unable to add test-specific Middleware when writing integration tests with WebApplicationFactory<T>: InvalidOperationException: Unable to build IHost #40361
  • ProtectedBrowserStorage documentation or source code security algorithm description #40360
  • Http.sys server should support setting up URL groups when attaching to an existing queue #40359
  • DelegationRule should continue to work after receiver process restart #40358
  • Blazor Add validation error/message for field #40357
  • Optimize SignalR connection for Blazor ServerPrerendered mode (CDN & Public sites) #40356
  • After VS Upgrade to 17.1 Hot Reload Issue #40354
  • Header names that contain periods are missing when using Kestrel #40349
  • Consider removing Mono specific code in SqlServerCache #40345
  • Change "Blazor component" to "Razor component" in a few spots #40344
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Friendly blazor for webpack #40343

Closed

  • Generate Minimal API from OpenAPI file #40135
  • Allow custom headers on SignalR WebSockets on React Native #40346
    7.0-preview3
  • ILogger/ILoggerProvider is unable to log general exceptions #40308
  • SDK 6.0.200 breaks Blazor projects in Azure DevOps Visual Studio build task #40333
  • AddRazorRuntimeCompilation Error #40291
  • Error Loading WASM Assets via CDN due to "credentials: include" #40348
  • Unable to run TestServer requests in parallel #40337
  • Add analyzer to force ConfigureAwait(false) on all awaits #31132
    7.0-preview3
  • Blazor: window.onresize event #40325
  • BLAZOR WASM - ADFS - OIDC - Documentation #40331
  • Blazor server DelegatingHandler for http client causing JavaScript error with prerendering disabled #40336
    Backlog
  • Unable to set route description or summary with minimal api #37906
    7.0-preview2

PullRequests

Created

  • Preserve user provided Auth header when access token factory not provided #40363
    area-signalr
  • Update sdk to v7.0.100-preview.3.22122.1 #40353
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/3.1] Use WixBundleName instead of WixBundle #40352
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 3.1.x
  • [release/5.0] Use WixBundleName instead of WixBundle #40351
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 5.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Use WixBundleName instead of WixBundle #40350
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x

Merged

  • Use Authorization header in WebSockets on React Native #40347
    area-signalr, community-contribution, 7.0-preview3
  • Update SignalR to use LoggerMessageAttribute #40303
    area-signalr, 7.0-preview3
  • Ignore MvcTemplate_SingleFileExe on Windows/ARM64 #40355
    area-mvc, 7.0-preview3
  • Add aspnet-build ownership of Version files #40309
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview3

Updated

  • Add analyzer to detect async void usage #40165
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Add Request Decompression middleware #40279
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • [WIP] Update installer/tests for ARM64 #39523
    area-runtime
  • Use LoggerMessageAttribute in more places #40297
    area-runtime
  • Add LinkerTest project #40342
    area-runtime
  • Complete inner Pipewriter in HttpLoggingMiddleware #39989
    area-runtime
  • Use libnethost to find hostfxr #39810
    area-runtime
  • feat (Minimal) : Add `EmptyResult` #40171
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Faster ParseHeaders #39216
    area-runtime
  • Only enable trailers/reset/goaway on OSs that support them #40310
    area-runtime
  • New TryParseModelBinder #40233
    area-mvc
  • Add gRPC JSON transcoding #40242
    area-grpc
  • Input components two way binding + InputBase handling of unparsable inputs #40326
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Use WixBundleName instead of WixBundle #40305
    area-infrastructure
  • Annotate SqlServer and Redis caches for nullability #40319
    area-runtime

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet.wasm diagnostics tools (load browser heap-snapshot to dotnet-dump analyze?) #2884

Closed

  • dotnet trace ps should report command line and managed entrypoint assembly name #2721
    Future
  • dotnet trace ps - show command line arguments #591
    .NET 7.0

PullRequests

Merged

  • Adding Commandline args to dotnet-tool ps #2831
    .NET 7.0

Updated

  • Update KnownData.cs #2878

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • retrieving ?android:attr/textColorPrimary throws an exception #4844
  • FormattedString Spans overlapping #4838
  • Unexpected end of stream on com.android.okhttp.Address@537f9da6 #4836
  • Screenshot doesn't work in older IOS devices #4835
  • xib files broken for .NET 6 IOS #4834
  • [Xaml]Assign to nullable properties #4832
  • Add an overloaded constructor for the requested types to simplify things #4831
  • Use "Razor component" and avoid "Blazor component" #4830
  • Crash when debugging on local device after the splash screen disappear #4824

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Filtered String-Based Includes #27493
  • Proxies throw for an abstract base record #27491
  • DataAnnotation BUG #27492
  • System.Data.SqlClient is not supported on this platform #27490

Closed

  • How to configure an entity property's generated sql to be a subquery or call to UDF? #27482
  • Writing from an overriden property causes unexpected behavior. #27476
  • Owned types' changes are not described correctly #27489
  • Make sure EF7 does not currently depend on .NET 7 packages #27254
  • Speed up insert operation (BulkSaveChanges) #15059
  • Create a migration failed with PowerShell command in PMC #27457
  • Errormessages already contain the exception with the stacktrace. #27465
  • ToLower not working with AsQueryable on sqlite #27378
  • Sorting of navigation properties - InMemoryDatabase #27415
  • Shadow key property not known error after property set by value generator #27472

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • The Runtime version of “ASP.NET Core Runtime” and “.NET Windows Desktop Runtime” in .NET 7.0 Preview 2 SDK are 7.0.0-preview.3.xxx. #13262

PullRequests

Created

  • Make NuGet.config copy path in source-build CI more explicit #13265
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'main' #13263

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'main' #13259

Updated

  • Merge 6.0.200 into 6.0.3xx #13236
  • Disable component governance for the non-shipping legs. #13243
